channel.title: Reality TV on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Reality TV on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hulu’s Virgin Dating Show Is a Wild Concept, But “Sex Sells — or the Lack of It,” Say Kaitlyn Bristowe and Colton Underwood
item.description: The ‘Bachelor’ franchise alum and co-hosts open up about the outlandishness of new reality series ‘Are You My First?,’ and Underwood’s upcoming appearance on ‘The Traitors.’

item.title: Hulu’s Virgin Dating Show Is a Wild Concept, But “Sex Sells — or the Lack of It,” Say Kaitlyn Bristowe and Colton Underwood
item.description: The ‘Bachelor’ franchise alum and co-hosts open up about the outlandishness of new reality series ‘Are You My First?,’ and Underwood’s upcoming appearance on ‘The Traitors.’

item.title: Why Jeff Probst Finally Let Mike White Return to ‘Survivor’ (and if He’d Make a ‘White Lotus’ Cameo)
item.description: The Emmy-winning (and recently nominated) host and EP dishes on ‘The White Lotus’ creator’s buzzy casting for season 50, and if he’d ever make an appearance in White’s beloved HBO show.

item.title: Why Jeff Probst Finally Let Mike White Return to ‘Survivor’ (and if He’d Make a ‘White Lotus’ Cameo)

item.title: Is Miami the Most Underrated ‘Real Housewives’ Franchise? NBCU Unscripted Exec and EP Weigh In
item.description: Matt Anderson and Kathleen French chat with The Hollywood Reporter about how they rebooted the once-paused show and season seven’s uncomfortable drink throw.

item.title: Is Miami the Most Underrated ‘Real Housewives’ Franchise? NBCU Unscripted Exec and EP Weigh In
item.description: Matt Anderson and Kathleen French chat with The Hollywood Reporter about how they rebooted the once-paused show and season seven’s uncomfortable drink throw.

item.title: ‘Project Runway’ Turns 21: Why Heidi Klum Came Back (and Made It Work Without Tim Gunn)
item.description: The supermodel and executive producer Michael Rucker discuss their homecomings to the series, the dynamic cast and why Christian Siriano remained as the designer’s mentor with the network shift.

item.title: ‘Project Runway’ Turns 21: Why Heidi Klum Came Back (and Made It Work Without Tim Gunn)
item.description: The supermodel and executive producer Michael Rucker discuss their homecomings to the series, the dynamic cast and why Christian Siriano remained as the designer’s mentor with the network shift.

item.title: ‘Building the Band’ Producers Talk Season 2 Hopes and Liam Payne Legacy: “He Saw His Own Experience Up There on Stage”
item.description: Cat Lawson and Alison Holloway discuss how the Netflix competition series came to fruition and filming with the late Payne: “He was gracious and at times nervous, because he wanted to get it right.”

item.title: ‘Building the Band’ Producers Talk Season 2 Hopes and Liam Payne Legacy: “He Saw His Own Experience Up There on Stage”
item.description: Cat Lawson and Alison Holloway discuss how the Netflix competition series came to fruition and filming with the late Payne: “He was gracious and at times nervous, because he wanted to get it right.”

item.title: ‘Next Gen NYC’ Creator on How ‘RHOSLC’ Led to New Bravo Show and Shutting Down “Nepo” Baby Skeptics: “It’s a Fun Situation”
item.description: To celebrate the season one finale, Michaline Babich chatted with The Hollywood Reporter about how ‘Next Gen’ overcame early doubt and won viewers over as one of the network’s hottest new shows.

item.description: The Hollywood Reporter tracked down filmmaker Phil Bowman to talk about the hit cable series that never was.

item.title: ‘Are You My First?’ Reality Series Brings Together Virgins Searching for Love
item.description: Hulu’s new “dating experiment” comes from the producers of ‘Love Island,’ and is co-hosted by the first virgin Bachelor, Colton Underwood, along with former Bachelorette Kaitlyn Bristowe.

item.title: Emily Simpson Almost Took a Break From ‘The Real Housewives of Orange County’ Amid Her Son’s Health Diagnosis
item.description: The reality star opens up to The Hollywood Reporter about how she navigated her child’s health condition in real time during season 19 and which of her co-stars she felt the most supported by.

item.title: MomTok on Top: ‘The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives’ Earns First Emmy Nomination
item.description: Hulu’s breakout series, centered around a group of Mormon mom influencers, was nominated in the outstanding unstructured reality program category on Tuesday.

item.description: The season three ‘Traitors’ winner will front the Hulu series from the ‘Call Her Daddy’ podcast host, set to debut next year.
